name: A glowing pair of frostburned leggings
data: It decreases the users strength slightly.
It increases the users wisdom divinely.
It increases the users charisma unbelievably much.
It has nice armour class for its type (low in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration monumentally.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users cold resistance superbly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
